errors.error_description: The conda installation command specifies the outdated `scitools` channel instead of the recommended `conda-forge` channel, which may lead to installation failure or outdated packages.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `conda install -c conda-forge iris-grib`.
Change the command to `conda install -c scitools -c conda-forge iris-grib`.
Remove the channel flag and run `conda install iris-grib`, assuming `conda-forge` is in the user's default channels.
Change the command to `conda install iris-grib --channel conda-forge`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `conda install -c conda-forge iris-grib`.
